extendedInfo.description: ParchÃ­s4A is an Android version of my old ParchÃ­s game for DOS and Linux.The parchÃ­s is a board game derived from Pachisi. It is very popular in Spain.This game is played with 1 dice and 4 pawns per player. The aim is simple: players compete on leading their four pawns out of their home, around the whole board, into the color track and up to the center of the board, chasing and eating" each other in the process.In ParchÃ­s4A you can select any combination of human and computer controlled players. For each robot you can choose from three strenght levels.ParchÃ­s4A doesn't have ads and doesn't need special permissions. It's (and ever will be) free to use and distribute.The source code of older versions is available in my web site as Free Software, under the GPLv3 license.Notes to comments:1- When all pawns are outside home, you count 7 if the dice rolls 6. This is a parchis rule.2- ParchÃ­s4A doesn't cheat, but if you don't trust it you can use the manual dice.seo: parchis, parchÃ­s, board games

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: Good graphics, lots of choices of players eg human/cpu + player levels. Sounds are good except for the die rolling, but that\'s my personal taste. So install this great app. Thanks.
reviews.author: sue Oliver

reviews.title: Great game
reviews.comment: I can\'t stop playing! The updates are awesome :-D
reviews.author: Kris McRay

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Very good, plays just like the real game. A very popular game in Spain. The game doesn\'t cheat at all. When all your counters are out,you count 7 with a 6. Although the dice dictate the luck, it contains elements of strategy. As in real life, if your counter can be munched, chances are it will be sent back home. Dice throws? Hmm, try it with your own dice. You\'ll be surprised how easy is to get six sixes in a row, or not get a five, In a long time.
reviews.author: Eddie Urbano

reviews.title: Good distraction
reviews.comment: Great game not sure computer doesnt cheat
reviews.author: Stephen Preston

reviews.title: Good Game
reviews.comment: It\'s a good game.  What are the chances, though, that when you are FAR ahead of the robots and only need a 1 to win 75% of what you roll will be a 5 with the other 25% split between 4s and 2s?  :-P  PS:  why does the blue robot roll so many triple sizes?
reviews.author: M Bryan

reviews.title: Bug with dice...
reviews.comment: I love that game but there is a bug with dice : every time an opponent is able to take my pawn, the dice gives the good number, so he does it. I thought of bad statistics but when it is systematic, we can call that a bug !
reviews.author: Gr\303\251gory Fleury

reviews.title: Good Game
reviews.comment: Parchis is an easy make to understand and a great tummy filler when you have 5 min to kill. My only problem is he difficulty seems to affect the luck of rolls moreso than the skill of the AIs.
reviews.author: Joshua Holzinger

reviews.title: Good game but...
reviews.comment: Wish there was an undo button for those times I\'m not being careful and accidentally choose the wrong pawn. Other than that, a great game.

reviews.comment: Great little Parchisi-variant, fun to kill a few mins. Reserve 1 star for low-res graphics, haven\'t tried it on tablet or w/ human-players yet.

reviews.comment: This is my favorite game, out of all the games I have on my phone. I always choose this game. It is so much fun. Thank you.

reviews.comment: Fun on easy. On the harder lvls it favors computer a lot. Computer rarely rolls 3six but you will. Frustrating.
